notes:
Data about UNHCR's populations of concern originating from Bonaire. There are five types of data available (by year, unless otherwise noted): 

1. Persons of concern

2. Time-series data for refugees

3. Refugee status determination for asylum seekers

4. Number of asylum seekers (by month).

5. Refugees resettled.

The source data comes from the [UNHCR Population Statistics](http://popstats.unhcr.org/en/overview) portal.
